entries.name: new(header, io)
entries.desc: Creates a new tar entry for header that will be read from io

entries.name: bytes_read()
entries.desc: Number of bytes read out of the tar entry

entries.name: directory?()
entries.desc: Is this tar entry a directory?

entries.name: eof?()
entries.desc: Are we at the end of the tar entry?

entries.name: file?()
entries.desc: Is this tar entry a file?

entries.name: full_name()
entries.desc: Full name of the tar entry

entries.name: getc()
entries.desc: Read one byte from the tar entry

entries.name: pos()
entries.desc: The position in the tar entry

entries.name: read(len = nil)
entries.desc: Reads len bytes from the tar file entry, or the rest of the entry if nil

entries.name: rewind()
entries.desc: Rewinds to the beginning of the tar file entry

entries.name: symlink?()
entries.desc: Is this tar entry a symlink?
